Services

SECURITY AS A SERVICE

What make us different?
HiveLOGIC has an innovative solution

We have constructed a business model with processes that connects:

events, tools, analysis and remediation

  HiveLOGIC takes events from any source.

  Feeds them into a portfolio of tools.

  Feeds automation and correlation tools, dashboards and visualisation views.

  Tools, views and dashboards are monitored by tier-zero analysts.

  They execute triage, monitor the screens and drive the workflow tools

  Events are folded into micro projects and sent to agile incident teams to be addressed.

  Effective dashboards and transparent communication in closed groups bring dovetailed skills and solutions to each micro-project.​
